name: Agri Barber (WatcherNinth)
description:
Thinking about hair loss but don't know where to start? It's time to come to Agri-Barber, the best hair plant since 2023! With the most advanced Liliput-Tech™ nano hair plant technology, we can quickly solve your hair loss problems that have been bothering you for years! 

How to get your ideal hair style in 3 steps: 

1. Drag our magical hair seeds to the field. 

2. Press the button on the left if you have finished designing your hair. 

3. Be impressed! 

Caution: Some of our hair might be twitching, waving, or come to life. This is normal and absolutely harmless.

This is a global game jam 2023 project, develop under the theme "roots". 

Our idea is to combine the roots of plants and the roots of hair. There is a magic barbershop run by tiny people, who can grow hair for the bald customer by planting in the field under the chair. The style of the hair is depending on the species of the plant.

You can also get a windows build and other information at the global game jam page below: 

https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/agri-barber-8
